item.title: Fuel Quantity Processor Channels – B.F. Goodrich (Simmonds) FQIS

remarks.para: Except for ER operations, one channel may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: All flight deck fuel indications are operative,
For non-PIP and non-Pegasus FMCs, both EICAS computers are operative,
FMC TOTALIZER FUEL quantity agrees with fuel quantity indications, and
For Pegasus FMCs with Operational Program Software part number 3418-HNP-02C-08 or earlier, Thrust Management System is operative.

Prior to each engine start, confirm that on the FMC Performance Initialization Page FUEL is automatically initialized with the known total fuel quantity. If not, (i.e., boxes appear), DO NOT manually enter fuel quantity; repairs must be made before dispatch.
Prior to each engine start, confirm that fuel flow system inputs are valid on the FMC SENSOR STATUS Page 1 (LEFT and RIGHT FUEL FLO).

placard.para: Placard Fuel Quantity Module on the P5 panel "PROCESSOR CHANNEL _______ - INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
